chunk_text: However, it will be deducted from the total cost or moved to a future date if you rebook with us. ####  How do I make a reservation? Gratuity for your tour driver and vineyard tasting room staff is not included. A 20% tip is customary at tasting rooms. If you wish to tip your tour guide, it can easily be added at the end of the tour using cash, card, Venmo, or CashApp. #### Is gratuity included? Most wineries are open from 11:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
